title: EasternSuperman and SkyCladNatsu RankedTrolls....
body: Third game in a row now matched with these trolls... i have reported time and time again with no results... they continue trolling.. exaple i was first pick went mundo top EasternSuperman then proceeded to say "im top idgaf" and locked in nocturne. so i said fine ill jg Skyclad locked in rengar and said "im jg idgaf" i was then annoyed so i said well i dont care im going top im first pick we then got into game where he proceeded to come top take all CS he coulld ability usage included to troll and steal every single kill either with ult or an ability when he wasnt in the fiht to begin with... nextgame im 2nd last pick so i call jg Superman calls top and Natsu was supposed to supp he changed exaughst last second to smite he thenproceeded to take all of my jg etc etc... then third andfinal game Natsu would come into lane "yes i was losing lane" take cs and intentionally feed the LeBlanc i was laning against... THIS IS RANKED KEEP IN MIND... Plz Roit do something about these guys... Normals no big deal but to troll so hard in ranked where im trying to get out of ELO hell is beyond frustrating and am seriousy conteplating uninstalling due to the sheer amount of trollers that are ruining the game for me... Thankyou for your time

replies.body: Don't name and shame. Send Riot a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with evidence.
